QuTiP was started at Dartmouth College under a U.S. Dept. of Education Graduate Assistance in Areas of National Need (GAANN) Fellowship.  Currently, support comes from the Japanese Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) under the Foreign Postdoctoral Fellowship program.
